ProjectTitle: Understanding a novel tissue surveillance mechanism that suppresses liver cancer
InitialFeedbackHistory:
02/06/2023
Data: please also list the samples that you will use, these are physical data, do these need special management such as storage under specific conditions? 
Metadata: Will you generate metadata with your experiments? For sequencing MINSEQE is often used, for flow cytometry MIFlowCyt and for microscopy OME. Check in the repositories that you may use or ask the core facility what they provide, for more information: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Sharing: Do you know already which repositories to use? EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) has many life sciences repositories, or if these are not suitable you can use RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
